summary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have inner text that is visible to screen readers
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"
  Element has no title attribute
description: Ensures buttons have discernible text
help: Buttons must have discernible text

summary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have inner text that is visible to screen readers
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"
  Element has no title attribute
description: Ensures buttons have discernible text
help: Buttons must have discernible text

summary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have inner text that is visible to screen readers
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"
  Element has no title attribute
description: Ensures buttons have discernible text
help: Buttons must have discernible text

summary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.64 (foreground color: #95969b, background color: #f1f2fa, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds
source: <button class="group_menu SubHeading" data-toggle="nocollapse" data-target="#footercollapse00" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="footercollapse00" data-gtm="1">Sobre</button>
help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

summary:
Fix any of the following:
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
description: Ensures every ARIA dialog and alertdialog node has an accessible name
source: <div class="modal fade modal-pre-page in" tabindex="-1" role="dialog" data-gtm-commonfield="33989718" data-gtm-obj="{1:'e-006.005.357.000.000.379',2:'e-006.005.357.000.000.444',3:'e-006.005.357.000.000.022',x200:'p-006.005.000.371.000.000'}" style="display: block; padding-right: 17px;">
help: ARIA dialog and alertdialog nodes must have an accessible name

summary:
Fix all of the following:
  Document does not have a main landmark
description: Ensures the document has a main landmark
help: Document must have one main landmark

summary:
Fix any of the following:
  The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable
description: Landmarks must have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination
help: Ensures landmarks are unique

summary:
Fix all of the following:
  Page must have a level-one heading
description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
help: Page must contain a level-one heading

summary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks
description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
source: <div class="slick-slide is-visible slick-current slick-active" data-slick-index="4" aria-hidden="false" style="width: 1348px;" role="tabpanel" id="slick-slide04" aria-describedby="slick-slide-control04">
help: All page content must be contained by landmarks

summary:
Fix all of the following:
  Check that focusable elements are not tabbable in the current state
description: Ensures aria-hidden elements do not contain focusable elements
source: <button class="btn buttonIcon" id="subMenuMinhaSKY" aria-hidden="true" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" data-gtm="8">
help: ARIA hidden element must not contain focusable elements

summary:

help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast
